Hello.

My name is Brock.

I am a Frontend Web Developer...

in San Juan Capistrano, CA.

Background & Skills

Fascination!

Like this little guy fascinated by the sight of baby chicks, one day in 2009 I found myself in a very similar state - staring at my computer and wondering just what in the world was going on behind the browser.

It seemed the best way to find out was to build a website myself. And so I did...
Well, fast forward 8 years and I still feel like that curious boy every time I build or create something as well as encounter or learn something new in web development.

Skills (Lessons Learned)

HTML

  • Write/modify all HTML markup by hand
  • Experience with HTML frameworks/libraries Bootstrap and Foundation (per client request)
  • Up to date on latest HTML5 standards

CSS

  • Write/modify all CSS by hand
  • Experience preprocessing CSS with SASS, Compass and Gulp via the terminal
  • Up to date on latest CSS3 features and corresponding browser support

JAVASCRIPT

  • Write/modify inline Jquery and read/modify existing vanilla javascript
  • Experience working with Jquery and its library of plugins
  • Experience working with javascript taskrunner Gulp
  • Currently studying Angular.js

PHOTOSHOP

  • Create/modify graphics and images with Photoshop/Gimp and Illustrator/Inkscape

WORDPRESS

  • Experience setting up/customizing stock wordpress sites
  • create Wordpress themes
  • Experience working with Wordpress' PHP code

MOBILE

  • Comprehensive experience building sites to perform well and look great on all devices
  • Knowledge of mobile product market's screen sizes and operating systems.
  • In depth experience working with CSS Media Queries for Responsive Web Design

PHP MYSQL JSON

  • Basic skills working with PHP, MYSQL, and JSON. Can read/modify code.
  • Experience plugging in MYSQL and PHP for use in database driven sites

SEO

  • Thorough knowledge of SEO best practices
  • Well-versed in proper HTML semantic markup for best search indexing

CROSS-BROWSER

  • Extensive experience working on cross-browser performance
  • Thorough experience working with browser-specific style sheets and tools such as modernizr, respond.js and reset css for more uniform cross-browser performance

ANALYTICS

  • Experience installing Google Analytics and reporting on site statistics

GIT & GITHUB

  • my account - nothing cooking

FTP
